about_the_game:
This is the first episode in the thrilling adventures of Ezra Blackwell. Fight, Flee, Farm, Hunt, Deal, and Drive in this adventure starring the super awesome and cool private investigator. Help Pappi's sons find him and discover what the evil corporation Syntech was hiding. This story has multiple endings so pay attention and check everything.

Farming consists of planting crops, keeping plots watered, and fertilizer can be used to speed up and double harvest. Plants do not grow at night.

Goblins come out at night and can get overwhelming without bullets. finding a bed or couch and sleeping in the beginning is the best bet.

The more stamina you have the faster you will catch your breath and start to regen stamina.

There are two vehicles in the game only one is fast enough to clear the gap.

If you get a vehicle stuck in the pit it is lost.

If you beat the game you get to listen to my one and only song, sung by me, the guy who made the game.

This game does get regular updates as of March 2024. The storyline may continue further if any traction.

short_description: First Person Mystery Adventure with twisting story and multiple endings. Investigate Pappi's disappearance and find secrets along the way. Earn some cash and deliver some pizza to a scary statue. You can earn cash by hunting, farming, or finding it on the ground.
